notes.en:potassium-bromate: Dough improver; prohibited EU/UK/CA; linked to carcinogenicity in animal studies.
notes.en:azodicarbonamide: Dough conditioner; not permitted in EU; byproduct concerns during baking.
notes.en:brominated-vegetable-oil: Emulsifier in citrus drinks; now prohibited by FDA (2024), Canada (2024), EU historically not authorized.
notes.en:partially-hydrogenated-oils: Industrial trans fats; PHOs removed from GRAS in US (2015 ruling; 2018â€“2020 compliance).
notes.en:titanium-dioxide: EU ban as additive E171 (2022); permitted with limits in several regions.
notes.en:sodium-nitrite: Nitrosamine formation risk in processed meats; strict limits/processing rules.
notes.en:cyclamates: Prohibited in US since 1970; permitted with limits in EU/CA.
